quoteText:
Web beacons (also known as internet tags, pixel tags and clear GIFs) are a similar technology which typically uses transparent graphic images placed on a site to gather information about a user.
Web beacons are used in combination with cookies to measure the actions of visitors on websites.
We make use of both cookies and web beacons when you visit our website, and refer to the technologies together as “cookies” throughout this policy.
title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
